top_comments.comment: Hope this place doesn't get destroyed by taliban

Kashmir is potential resource as tourism and famous for rich haul of quality apples ,saffron and other cottage industries. Unfortunately due to political instability, the same suffered.  All inclusiveness is the mantra   entailing shedding off religious differences what so ever

comments_since_last_sample.body: I am going to spoil the party.  Has anyone done enviromental assessment. of course not. what about the creatures? do they have any right to existence? of course not.
